doc:
George Peppard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Peppard 0 George Peppard Jr. (; October 1, 1928 – May 8, 1994) was an American film and television actor. Peppard secured a major role when he starred alongside Audrey Hepburn in Breakfast at Tiffany's (1961), and later portrayed a character based on Howard Hughes in The Carpetbaggers (1964). On television, he played the title role of millionaire insurance investigator and sleuth Thomas Banacek in the early-1970s mystery series Banacek. He played Col. John "Hannibal" Smith, the cigar-smoking leader of a renegade commando squad, in the hit 1980s action show The A-Team. George_Peppard_Jr. ( ; October_1_,_1928 – May_8_,_1994 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . Peppard secured a_major_role when he starred alongside Audrey_Hepburn in Breakfast at Tiffany 's_(_1961_) , and later_portrayed a_character based on Howard_Hughes in The_Carpetbaggers ( 1964_) . On television , he played the_title_role of millionaire_insurance_investigator and sleuth_Thomas_Banacek in the_early-1970s_mystery_series_Banacek . He played Col._John_"_Hannibal_"_Smith , the_cigar-smoking_leader of a_renegade_commando_squad , in the_hit_1980s_action show The_A-Team .
